Recommendations: 1. A plan of action be presented to address the result of the client satisfaction survey to better or improve the operations of the frontline units.
2. Pictures included in the documents must have a caption indicating the details of the activity or event.
3. Revise or improve the entry of the logbook presented to show the necessary details of the issues and concerns raised by the students, and the action taken by the concerned official/office.
4. Update the documents presented to cover the accreditation period.
